description: Design a combat encounter with terrain and objectives
input: Design an encounter for a derelict space station hangar. Players fight waves of corrupted drones while activating 3 power nodes to open the exit. Level range: 15-18.
expected_behavior: Produces an encounter spec with enemy composition per wave, terrain layout with cover and hazards, power node placement creating movement decisions, difficulty parameters, estimated clear time, and reward structure.
rubric: Enemy composition scales to level range
Reward structure ties to economy system

description: Design a difficulty curve for a zone
input: Create the difficulty curve for the Crimson Nebula zone (levels 20-30). It should have a tutorial area, escalating challenge, a mid-zone mini-boss, and a final boss.
expected_behavior: Produces a difficulty curve with encounter-by-encounter difficulty ratings, pacing (tension/release rhythm), rest points, and a chart showing the curve shape. References appropriate curve pattern from difficulty guide.
rubric: Curve has clear phases (tutorial, escalation, climax)
Mini-boss and boss are difficulty spikes with recovery after
